item.title: Energy Shocks, firms' Productivity and Markups
item.description: This paper attempts to study how firms productivity and markups respond to energy shocks.

item.title: The Effects of Hiring Discrimination over the Business Cycle
item.description: We show theoretically that hiring discrimination implies a higher volatility of labor market outcomes for the discriminated group in the context of a standard search-and-matching model with an urn-ball matching function.

item.title: Export Diversification Dynamics in Latin America
item.description: In this chapter, we construct a set of export diversification measures in order to give a detailed view of export diversification dynamics in Latin America.
